meanings.definition: Inhibited or slowed in growth or development.
meanings.sent1: The stunted plant struggled to grow in the dry soil.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the stunted crops due to lack of sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The stunted tree tried to reach the sky but couldn't quite make it.
meanings.sent4: Her stunted progress in math class made her feel frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The stunted puppy's small size made it even more adorable.

meanings.definition: To hinder the growth or development of.
meanings.sent1: Lack of proper nutrition can stunted a child's growth.
meanings.sent2: The weeds stunted the growth of the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to stunted the growth of the oak tree by burying nuts in its roots.
meanings.sent4: Negative thoughts can stunted your personal development if you let them take over.
meanings.sent5: The harsh winter weather stunted the progress of the construction project.
